reasons: prediction_0 and prediction_2 are identical;prediction_1 has extra information and alterations that may not be accurate
output:
Military personnel and law enforcement agencies have been working hard in an attempt to gain some kind of control over the situation.
But most of their efforts have been for nothing.
The main advice to our citizens is to tell private citizens to stay inside their homes behind locked doors.
Do not venture outside for any reason until the nature of this crisis has been determined.
And until we can advise what course of action to take.
Keep listening to radio and TV for special instructions as this crisis develops further.
